title: Delivery driver verification (vulnerable recipients)
dataVerified: Driver name, photo, vehicle details, package tracking, delivery company
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Delivery status (verified/expected). Real-time verification shows driver photo, vehicle details (make/color/plate), package tracking number confirming expected delivery. Link to delivery company system. Verifier can display 'This is your expected delivery for package #123456' confirmation
rationale: Elderly person or woman alone verifies delivery driver credentials before opening door. Domain binding verifies delivery company (amazon.com/delivery-verify, ups.com, fedex.com). Prevents fake delivery driver scams (common fraud targeting elderly). Critical safety for vulnerable people at home.
